snippet.title: Oldest Santa Fe joke
snippet.description:
Oldest Santa Fe joke
19 Apr 2014 by John Robertson on dreamranch dreamranch.wordpress.com/2014/04/19/oldest-santa-fe-joke/
Question: How many Santa Feans does it take to change a light bulb? Answer: Three. One to change the bulb and two to step back and say how good it used to look.
